comments.raw_text:
I think it would be a rad feature if the Bugzilla links rendered by MediaWiki could automatically query the Bugzilla API and present useful bug metadata. For example:

* On link hover, the bug summary and status is displayed
* The link text could automatically be changed to the bug summary
* Text strikethrough would be used if the bug is not open

Assuming the Bugzilla servers can handle this, it should probably be done with client-side JS so 1) page rendering isn't slowed by MediaWiki querying Bugzilla 2) referenced confidential bugs could be rendered if the user viewing the page has permissions on that bug.

Just an idea.
